thread.title: BRIEF-Formpipe receives US Life Science order worth SEK 1 million

title: BRIEF-Formpipe receives US Life Science order worth SEK 1 million
text:
BRIEF-Formpipe receives US Life Science order worth SEK 1 million Sept 10 
Sept 10 Formpipe Software AB : 
* Receives US Life Science order worth 1 million Swedish crowns ($118,985) 
* Contract regards the use of Formpipe's X-train product to manage training documentation 
Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 8.4044 Swedish crowns) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
